name: Blobbys Journey Home
description:
Blobby has wandered too far away from home. Lost and bewildered, he needs your help to fly and navigate him back, avoiding the hazards in front of him.

Blobbys Journey Home----------------

Navigate and boost Blobby through the air, avoiding contact with everything (including the ceiling) except the glowing green destination pad in each level. 

Controls ---------------

= Boost 

Rotate Blobby

Return to the Title Screen

Credits------------------

Created by sfChris (spriteyfrog) using the Unity Engine

music: "Jellyfish in Space" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

special thanks to gamedev.tv for Project Boost
